channel.title: Does Anyone else Play from the Mott Community College in Flint, Michigan?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Does Anyone else Play from the Mott Community College in Flint, Michigan?" - Trying to avoid any potential duplicate IP issues before use the school computers to play.

item.title: Re: Does Anyone else Play from the Mott Community College in Flint, Michigan?
item.content:encoded: You're probably okay. I haven't seen any other IP conflicts since the last set got cleared up.

item.title: Does Anyone else Play from the Mott Community College in Flint, Michigan?
item.content:encoded: I'm taking classes at the Mott Community College Main Campus at 1401 East Court St, Flint Michigan. I just wanted to know if any other village members are students there and play on the campus computers, to avoid any duplicate IP issues. I figure it's a slim chance, but I thought I'd ask anyway.
